title: Mike Phillips declared local by FIBA, now eligible for Gilas Pilipinas
desc: MANILA, Philippines — De La Salle’s outgoing big man Mike Phillips has been declared a local by FIBA, the world’s governing basketball body, making the athletic Filipino-American eligible to play for Gilas Pilipinas in all international tournaments.
